data.title: Great place to get a gift in a hurry
data.text: It is a great place to pick up that quick gift you need.  They seem to have something for every one on your list. Especially if you wanted to get a gift that is Marietta specific.  They are friendly and Helpful.  They gift wrap so you leave ready to go with your gift.

data.title: Great Selection of STUFF
data.text: They have a great variety of everything!  From "memory items" (i.e. grown-ups souvenirs) to vintage jewelry and clothing for locals.  They also have a selection of NCAA items and some decorative things for the home.

data.title: great food and shopping.
data.text: Great selection of gifts and accessories.  Prices can't be beat.  Upstairs, the food is very appealing.  Perfect for ladies' luncheon.
